We are hiring for C2H Position

Position: Sr. Java AWS Developer
 Location: Chicago, IL (Hybrid)
 Employment: Contract
 
Job Description:
The client might make candidates, write code around Java and go deep in AWS- Lambda/S3.
Let me know if you have any question.
Full Stack Engineer
5+ years of hands-on experience in AWS cloud-native deployment environments.
Strong background in software development with the ability to understand requirements and apply application design patterns
Excellent understanding and implementation knowledge of memory and CPU optimized TCP/HTTP applications in Java (latest version)
 
Skills:
Proficient in developing highly resilient Java applications with a defensive coding mindset, capable of working independently from day one.
Expertise in implementing the following AWS services in enterprise environments for time-sensitive, fault tolerant and highly available (multi region) application Lambda, SQS, ElastiCache, Kinesis, DynamoDB, RDS/Aurora, S3, ECS, KMS.
 
Technical Stack:
Runtime: Java 21.
Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Integration, Spring WebClient, Spring Cache
Protocols and Integration: HTTP/TCP REST and JSON & XML.
 
Tools:

Experience with Spring Boot, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Familiarity with serverless architecture and API Gateway.

Naveen Sagar (Mark)
